mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT MESSAGE_NO=#{messageNo}, TO_USER_NO=#{toUserNo}, FROM_USER_NO=#{fromUserNo}, MESSAGE_CONTENT=#{messageContent}, MESSAGE_REG_DATE=#{messageRegDate}, MESSAGE_TYPE=#{messageType}, MESSAGE_TITLE=#{messageTitle}, PRODUCT_NO=#{productNo} FROM MESSAGE WHERE FROM_USER_NO=#{userNo} ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN (#{search.currentPage}-1)*#{search.pageSize}+1 AND #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize}
